title: Sweeping Attack
content:
Sweeping Attack Effect Swing your weapon in a rapid, sweeping arc to attack multiple enemies at once. Roll your superiority die for damage. Requirements Lvl 3 Battle Master (Fighter Subclass)Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.
